description: Chilcano is a pisco cocktail that originated in Peru. It's made with pisco, lime juice, ginger ale or club soda, and crushed ice. The pisco gives it a fruity flavor, while the lime juice adds just enough sweetness to balance out the tartness of the ginger ale.
name: Chilcano de Pisco
recipeIngredient: Lime wedge or wheel, for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a highball glass filled with ice, add the lime juice.
recipeInstructions.text: In a highball glass filled with ice, add the lime juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the glass with pisco and ginger ale. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the glass with pisco and ginger ale. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with lime wedge or wheel.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with lime wedge or wheel.
